data.feedback: Epic correctly addresses all platform configuration requirements with accurate technical specifications. TechLead appropriately converted filesToModify to filesToCreate since Flutter project is greenfield. Health API configurations (minSdk 26, iOS 12.0, proper entitlements) are accurate.

issues.recommendation: Consider using flutter create generated template as base

suggestions: For Story 4, developers should start with flutter create output and modify rather than write from scratch
Add note that Firebase config files need Firebase Console setup first (relevant for later epic)
